item.title: Hidden information and solving Dominoes - Emir's blog
item.description: Some notes about the construction of a Block Dominoe playing algorithm for a hidden information variant of the game. I build a game simulator, learn from a heuristic algorithm and then develop some play-out based algorithms which seem fairly good. I conjecture the final algorithm approximates optimal play.

item.title: S6E03 - From Self-Taught to MVP: Navigating the Event-Driven World with Josh Garverick
item.description: Josh Garverick dives into the world of software development, sharing his experiences and discussing the latest trends and technologies. From Josh's self-taught journey to his work with the ALM Rangers group, listeners gain valuable insights from a seasoned developer. The conversation covers event-driven architectures, domain-driven design, and the shift towards providing value and adding value to organizations. The importance of testing and making informed decisions based on requirements is also emphasized. This episode offers practical advice and a glimpse into the ever-evolving world of software development.
